vote.title: Authorize the purchase of electric bicycles for the Dallas Police Department Bike Unit - American Bike Patrol Services, lowest responsible bidder of five - Not to exceed $159,999.60 - Financing:  2023 Homeland Security-Urban Area Security Initiative 24-26 Fund
